mapper.select: select count(distinct r.rev_num) from review r , product p, member m

select rev_num, prd_body_thum, rev_title, rev_write_date, name, rev_hits from( select r.rev_num, r.rev_title, to_char(r.rev_write_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as rev_write_date, r.rev_hits, m.name, p.prd_body_thum, row_number() over(order by r.rev_write_date desc)r_num from review r, member m, product p where r.id = m.id and r.prd_num = p.prd_num ) WHERE r_num BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum} order by rev_num desc

select r.rev_num, r.rev_title, to_char(r.rev_write_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as rev_write_date, r.rev_hits, r.rev_cont, m.name, p.prd_body_thum, p.prd_name, p.prd_price, p.prd_discount from review r, member m, product p where r.id=m.id and r.prd_num = p.prd_num and rev_num=#{revNum}
